translations: 烤饼（scone 的复数）；司康饼；比司吉；土干包

sentences.sentence: You can also make raisin scones.
sentences.translation: 你也可以做葡萄干烤饼。

sentences.sentence: Will you teach me how to make scones,please?
sentences.translation: 您能教我怎样做烤饼吗？

sentences.sentence: Of course. I'll teach you how to make scones.
sentences.translation: 当然我会教你怎样做烤饼。
